thread.title: Attacks widen gulf between Palestinian, Israeli authorities PBS NewsHour

author: pbs.org
title: Attacks widen gulf between Palestinian, Israeli authorities PBS NewsHour
text: Overnight in Israel, a lone gunman shot and killed a soldier and injured several people at a bus station before being shot and killed himself. Meanwhile in East Jerusalem, authorities continued to escalate their security presence. Special correspondent Martin Seemungal reports on whatâ€™s fueling Palestinian anger behind the recent attacks, and why Secretary of State John Kerry is stepping in.
